attributes.action: Reduce the amount of car insurance premiem for transportation industry.
attributes.background: Decrease the amount of car insurance premiem for Delivery Driver, Lorry Drivers and anyone for works in the transportation industry as we spend most of our times on the road so we have the experience of driving hours on the road not by how many years we have been driving.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. The cost of car insurance is the responsibility of insurance companies, not the Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to reduce the cost of insurance.
